mapper.sql: select a.groups_id as groupsId, a.groups_name as groupsName, b.groups_name as gname, a.other_name as otherName, a.last_modify_time as lastModifyTime, a.last_modify_user as lastModifyUser, a.is_valid as isValid, a.hosts as hosts from monitor_groups a, cmdb_resource_groups b WHERE a.groups_name = b.groups_id
mapper.insert: insert into monitor_groups( groups_id, groups_name, last_modify_time, last_modify_user, is_valid, hosts, other_name ) values( #{groupsId}, #{groupsName}, #{lastModifyTime}, #{lastModifyUser}, #{isValid}, #{hosts}, #{otherName} )
mapper.update: update monitor_groups set groups_id=#{groupsId}, groups_name=#{groupsName}, last_modify_time=#{lastModifyTime}, last_modify_user=#{lastModifyUser}, is_valid=#{isValid}, hosts=#{hosts}, other_name = #{otherName} where groups_id=#{groupsId}
